page.title: 05Social Clubs-Middle Barton
page.content: 10 years ago the Sports Pavilion was converted into the Social Club by the football members.There are lots of indoor sports like Pool,Darts and Crib. You can become a member by a member signing an application form.The Guides meet on Friday at the Sunday School.The subs are 1.50 every half term.Every Friday the Scouts meet at 7.30-9.30 at the Alice Marshall Hall.They pay 35p each night.Once a month on a Wednesday at 8.00pm,the Flower Club meet at the Alice Marshall Hall.Often people come to demonstrate flower arrangements.The arrangements made are then raffled. Refreshments are available.The Flower Club is only for adults and it runs all year round.Other clubs in the village are Drama,Womens Institute, Cubs and Brownies.
